Maths Manthraa User Guide

1. Introduction
Maths Manthraa is an innovative and inclusive math learning app designed for students of all abilities.
With a variety of interactive modes — including touch, motion, and sound-based learning — it makes math engaging and accessible.

2. How to Use Maths Manthraa?
Maths Manthraa provides multiple game and learning modes, designed to reinforce core mathematical concepts through fun, interactive exercises.

3. Features Overview
Game Modes:
• Quick Play Mode – Instantly starts a random math challenge without navigating menus.
• Drum Mode – Tap the screen to match the required count.
• Bell Mode – Shake the phone to count bells.
• Drawing Mode – Draw basic shapes for spatial awareness.
• Directional Mode – Rotate the device to match target directions.
• Touch the Screen Mode – Place a specific number of fingers on the screen.
• Stereo Sound Mode – Solve math problems using stereo audio cues.
• MCQ Mode – Answer multiple-choice math questions.

Learning Modes:
• Currency Mode – Learn to manage money with real-life purchase scenarios.
• Time Mode – Solve time-related math problems.
• Distance Mode – Calculate speed and distance problems.
• Core Arithmetic – Basic addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
• Number Line Mode – Swipe to solve problems on a number line.

4. Accessibility Features
• Fully supports TalkBack and custom accessibility gestures.
• Text-to-Speech (TTS) guides users through menus and exercises.

5. Settings
• Customize sound, speech, and high-contrast mode.
• Enable or disable background music and vibrations.

6. Quit Option
• Users are prompted with a confirmation dialog before exiting the app.

7. Localization
• Supports multiple languages for a wider reach.

Enjoy learning with Maths Manthraa!
